class.name: PIXI.Circle

parameters.name: x
parameters.help: The X coordinate of the center of this circle

parameters.name: y
parameters.help: The Y coordinate of the center of this circle

class.help: The Circle object can be used to specify a hit area for displayObjects

public.name: clone
public.help: Creates a clone of this Circle instance

public.name: contains

returns.help: Whether the x/y coordinates are within this Circle

public.help: Checks whether the x and y coordinates given are contained within this circle

parameters.name: x
parameters.help: The X coordinate of the point to test

parameters.name: y
parameters.help: The Y coordinate of the point to test

public.name: getBounds
public.help: Returns the framing rectangle of the circle as a PIXI.Rectangle object
